author: Stephanie Kaul
title: Conviva Named Finalist in Streaming Media 2015 Readers' Choice Awards
text:
Conviva, the leader in Over the Top (OTT) video experience optimization, today announced its monitoring product, Conviva Insights, has been named a finalist in the 2015 Streaming Media Readers' Choice Awards in the category of: Reporting & Analytics Platform. “Being named a finalist for the 2015 Streaming Media Readers’ Choice Awards, confirms our belief that companies need more than static audience measurement,” said Dr. Hui Zhang, CEO of Conviva. “This recognition is validation that a complete 360-degree view of the video delivery ecosystem is key as broadcasters, operators and publishers depend on the direct correlation between experience and engagement to make effective data-driven business decisions.”
Conviva Insights provides broadcasters, operators and publishers with real-time, actionable intelligence by aggregating and reporting viewer experience and engagement metrics. The platform enables broadcasters, operators and publishers to make better, data-driven business decisions by delivering a comprehensive and in-depth perspective of the quality of their customers' experience.
With nearly 36,000 votes cast across 249 nominees to determine the finalists, the winners of the 2015 Streaming Media Readers' Choice Awards will be announced Nov. 18, 2015 at Streaming Media West in Huntington Beach, Calif. At that event, Conviva’s Chief Strategy Officer, Keith Zubchevich, will speak about experience syndication and the future of broadcast consumption. The session, Changing the Channel on the Broadcast Business Model, is at 10:30 a.m. on Nov. 18.
###
About Conviva
Conviva partners with top-tier media companies and premium OTT video broadcasters and operators like HBO, ESPN, and Viacom to deliver optimized viewing experiences that maximize customer engagement. The Conviva Intelligent Control Platform helps providers meet and exceed ever-changing audience expectations for video experience, across a multi-screen viewing environment. Using a unique real-time map of the Internet video delivery ecosystem, the platform provides 360-degree visibility across all users, maximizes picture fidelity, and eliminates playback delays and interruptions. Multi-dimensional reports and analyses of the top-tier OTT market, based on Conviva’s tracking of 50 billion streams annually, enable data-driven decisions, supporting successful development of market-leading services. Conviva is based in Silicon Valley, with offices in New York and London. Please visit http://www.conviva.com and follow us on Twitter @Conviva.
